generated.css: html{overflow-y:scroll;overflow-x:hidden}body{margin:0;padding:0;line-height:1.5em;font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif;min-height:100%}embed,img,object,svg,video{max-width:100%;width:100%;height:auto}*{box-sizing:border-box}div,img{transition:1s}:focus{outline:none}header{background:#7fb223;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover;background-position:50%;padding:2rem;position:relative;overflow:hidden}header.start{background-image:url(20e272e2878590198e0a2286b2a5c342.jpg);height:30rem}.logo{max-width:3.5rem;position:absolute;top:1.5rem;left:1.5rem;transition:.5s ease-out}.logo:hover{transform:scale(1.2)}nav{max-height:0;width:100%;overflow:hidden;transition:.6s;text-align:center;opacity:1;transition:1s ease;background-color:#fff}nav ul{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}nav li{padding:1rem;cursor:pointer;border-bottom:1px solid #7fb223}nav a{font-size:1.5rem;text-decoration:none;font-weight:700;position:relative;transition:.5s ease;display:block}nav a:active,nav a:link,nav a:visited{color:#000}nav a:hover{color:#7fb223}nav.show{max-height:20rem}.burger{cursor:pointer;background:transparent;border:none;transform:scale(1.2);transition:.5s ease-out;position:absolute;top:2rem;right:2.2rem}.bar1,.bar2,.bar3{width:35px;height:2px;background-color:#fff;margin:9px 0;transition:.4s}.burger:hover{transform:scale(1.5);transition:.5s ease-out}.change .bar1{-webkit-transform:rotate(-45deg) translate(-9px,9px);transform:rotate(-45deg) translate(-8px,9px) scale(1.2)}.change .bar2{opacity:0}.change .bar3{-webkit-transform:rotate(45deg) translate(-7px,-18px);transform:rotate(45deg) translate(-7px,-7px) scale(1.2)}:focus{outline:0}.pulse{animation:pulse 3s infinite}@keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(1)}80%{transform:scale(1)}90%{transform:scale(1.5)}to{transform:scale(1)}}.text-header{margin:5rem 0 0;color:#fff}.text-header ul{list-style:none;margin:1rem 0 0;padding:0;font-size:1.3rem;max-width:70%}.text-header ul li{padding:0;margin:0}.text-header ul li:before{content:"// "}.text-header h1{font-size:2.5rem;font-family:Rajdhani,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0;line-height:2.75rem}.text-header a:active,.text-header a:link,.text-header a:visited{color:#fff}.profile{position:absolute;bottom:0;right:-5rem;max-width:18rem}.some{font-size:2rem;margin:1.5rem 0 0}.some i{cursor:pointer;transition:.5s;margin:0 .25rem 0 0}.some i:hover{cursor:pointer;transform:scale(1.2)}.portfolio_bg{background:#1d1d1d}header.subpage{background-image:url(20e272e2878590198e0a2286b2a5c342.jpg);display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;height:7rem}.subpage-header{color:#fff;margin:0}.subpage-header h1{font-size:2.5rem;font-family:Rajdhani,sans-serif;text-transform:uppercase;margin:0;line-height:2.75rem}.portfolio{min-height:100vw;padding:2rem}.portfolio .cases{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-gap:2rem;color:#fff}.portfolio .cases .customer{margin-bottom:0;font-weight:700}.portfolio .cases .case{font-style:italic;margin:0}.portfolio .case{transition:.5s}.portfolio .case:hover{transform:scale(1.05);cursor:pointer}.hidden{display:none}.portfolio .single_cases{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-gap:2rem;color:#fff}.details_wrapper ul{margin:0}.display_wrapper{padding:.5rem 0 0}.details_wrapper .customer{margin-bottom:0;font-weight:700;font-size:1.5rem}#loader_bg{width:100%;height:100%;background:#1d1d1d;z-index:500}#loader{position:absolute;left:50%;top:50%;z-index:1;width:150px;height:150px;margin:-75px 0 0 -75px;border-radius:50%;border:16px solid #f3f3f3;border-top-color:#7fb223;width:120px;height:120px;animation:spin 1s linear infinite}@keyframes spin{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@media only screen and (min-width:30rem) and (max-width:47.99999rem){header.start{height:25rem}header.start,header.subpage{background-image:url(ef097fa601d0fb5106b8d9bce5050648.jpg)}header.subpage{height:7rem}.subpage-header{color:#fff;margin:0}.profile{right:-3rem;max-width:18rem}.portfolio .cases{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}}@media only screen and (min-width:48rem){header.start{height:25rem}header.start,header.subpage{background-image:url(e8dd2e44b92e18e0a9da40f7829e0b43.jpg)}header.subpage{height:12rem}.subpage-header{margin:2rem 0 0}.burger{display:none}nav{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;width:auto;color:#fff;background-color:transparent;min-height:5rem;text-align:right;transition:0s;padding:2rem 2rem 0 0;opacity:1;z-index:500}nav li{display:inline;padding:0 0 0 2rem;border-bottom:none}nav a{font-size:1.2rem;font-weight:400;display:inline-block}nav a:active,nav a:link,nav a:visited{color:#fff}nav a:hover{transform:scale(1.2)}.text-header{max-width:100%}.profile{right:2rem;max-width:20rem}.portfolio .cases{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr}.portfolio .single_cases{grid-template-columns:2fr 1fr}}@media only screen and (min-width:55rem){.portfolio .cases{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr}.portfolio .single_cases{grid-template-columns:2fr 1fr}}@media only screen and (min-width:64rem){header.start{height:25rem}header.start,header.subpage{background-image:url(ea7a0bff9ab81726a2855fb0212f6a16.jpg)}header.subpage{height:9rem}.subpage-header{margin:0}.wrapper{max-width:64rem;margin:0 auto}.profile{right:8rem;max-width:22rem}.portfolio .cases{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr}.portfolio .single_cases{grid-template-columns:2fr 1fr}}@media only screen and (min-width:80rem){.profile{right:15rem;max-width:25rem}}.details_wrapper,.display_wrapper{padding:0}@media only screen and (min-width:100rem){.profile{right:23rem;max-width:27rem}}.display_wrapper{padding:2rem 0 0}.details_wrapper{padding:9rem 0 0}@media print{*{background:transparent!important;color:#000!important;text-shadow:none}a,a:visited{color:#00f!important;text-decoration:underline}a:after{content:" (" attr(href) ")"}abbr:after{content:" (" attr(title) ")"}.ir a:after{content:""}blockquote,pre{border:1px solid #999}blockquote,img,pre{page-break-inside:avoid}@page{margin:.5cm}h2,h3,p{orphans:3;widows:3}h2,h3{page-break-after:avoid}}
